tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: Genius Game
programme.desc: Reality game show presented by David Tennant. The finalists go head-to-head in a best-of-three Death Match format, but only one player can be victorious by winning two games.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: MandS: Dress the Nation
programme.desc: AJ Odudu and Vernon Kay host the second series grand final as the three remaining designers go head-to-head in their biggest challenge yet by creating their own full collections.

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Lorraine Kelly presents a topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz gossip.

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: Magazine show with celebrity guests, entertainment, advice, competitions and features.

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: STV Racing: Live from Cheltenham
programme.desc: Oli Bell presents coverage of racing from Cheltenham and Doncaster - the feature meeting is the opening day of the 2025-26 National Hunt season from Cheltenham.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: All that stands between Eddie from London, Karen from Stockton-on-Tees, Michael from Manchester, Lauren from Skelmersdale and thousands of pounds is the small matter of a Chaser.

programme.title: STV News at Six
programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Whats on Scotland
programme.desc: Laura Boyd and Emma Cameron look at whats creating a buzz around Scotland this week.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: There are new housemates for someone, Dylan is trapped, and Caleb pays off a problem.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Theo berates Todd for his careless treatment of his new car, Debbie suspects Abi of dodgy dealings, and a conciliatory lunch between Tyrone, Fiz and Cassie is filled with tension.

programme.title: Borderline
programme.desc: The conclusion of this case of the police drama series. Regan and Boyd continue their investigation into the two deaths that occurred at the abandoned fuel tanker.

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: The days national and international news with a fresh perspective.

programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: Champions: Full Gallop
programme.desc: Documentary series. Its Boxing Day at Kempton as undefeated Constitution Hill returns from illness to face Irish star Lossiemouth and Paul Townend chases a Grand Slam.

programme.title: Romesh Ranganathans Parents Evening
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan hosts the celebrity game show as Alex Brooker, Sophie Ellis-Bextor and mum Janet Ellis, and Jeff and Bobby Brazier compete for charity.

programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: In Convo - Fresh Cuts 2025
programme.desc: Ras Kwame hosts a series of conversations celebrating life, the arts and human existence with a range of guests opening the door to unfiltered and honest conversations.

programme.title: Say Less! - Fresh Cuts 2025
programme.desc: A slick and absurdist sketch show, starring rising Black British talent, that unleashes sharp side-eye comedy with zero chill while capturing the chaos of Gen Z life today.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: Judi Loves Culinary Cruise
programme.desc: Judi visits the archaeological site of Delphi and decides which goddess she would be, heads off to a bee farm, and makes the famous kaitafi dessert at a family-run bakery.

programme.title: Raymond Blancs Royal Kitchen Gardens
programme.desc: Raymond is back at Hampton Court Palace to meet one of its oldest residents and learn how Georgian hot chocolate would have been made.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James visits the capital of the balti - Birmingham - and meets acclaimed food critic, broadcaster and author Grace Dent as he takes to a narrow boat.

programme.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Joining Alan at Manor Farm are Ben Miller, David Essex, and Thelma Barlow to provide the chat alongside farmer Tom Davis and some very cute Anglo-Nubian goats.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: James Martins Saturday Morning
programme.desc: James is back with Professor T star Ben Miller, dishes from chefs Lisa Goodwin-Allen and Sami Tamimi, and a chat with gardener David Domoney in his vegetable patch.

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: Champions: Full Gallop
programme.desc: Documentary series. Its Boxing Day at Kempton as undefeated Constitution Hill returns from illness to face Irish star Lossiemouth and Paul Townend chases a Grand Slam.

programme.title: STV Racing: Live from Cheltenham
programme.desc: Oli Bell presents coverage of racing from Cheltenham, Doncaster and Newbury including the second day of the 2025 October Meeting at Cheltenham and the Futurity Trophy at Doncaster.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: International Football: England v Brazil
programme.desc: Seema Jaswal is joined by Ian Wright and Anita Asante as Englands Lionesses - fresh from their Euro 2025 victory - face Brazil in a friendly at the Etihad Stadium.

programme.title: Tipping Point: Best Ever Finals
programme.desc: Looking back at Tipping Points most thrilling end games as plucky players and famous faces alike take on the machine for its jackpot.

programme.title: The 1% Club
programme.desc: Lee Mack presents the ultimate leveller of a quiz show where it doesnt matter if youre not usually good at quizzes because the questions are all about logic and common sense.

programme.title: Romesh Ranganathans Parents Evening
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan hosts the celebrity game show as Tom Allen, Steve Pemberton, and Fleur East go head to head alongside their families.

programme.title: The Jonathan Ross Show: Special Guests
programme.desc: The guests featured with Jonathan in this show include Alicia Keys, Steve Carell, Stormzy, Emma Thompson, Stephen Graham, Jack Whitehall and Carrie Fisher.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: English Football League Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the weekends games in the EFL including Coventry City v Watford, Ipswich Town v West Bromwich Albion, and Middlesbrough v Wrexham in the Championship.
